medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain and nausea for 1 day.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient awoke from sleep around 3am on the morning of admission with severe sharp cramping diffuse abdominal pain accompanied by nausea. Had a bowel movement two hours later which provided some relief, but pain worsened and nausea persisted. Reports not passing flatus since yesterday.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Prior abdominal surgeries, including status-post right hemicolectomy for stage IIa colon cancer; hepatic flexure colon cancer; gastric ulcer; iron deficiency anemia; history of cancer and ulcer; hypertension; heart murmur; hypothyroidism; prediabetes; lichen sclerosis; agoraphobia with panic attacks.
